revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Indian Antiquities: or, dissertations, relative to the ancient geographical divisions, the pure system of primeval theology, the grand code of civil laws, the origin..."
revision.text: Possibly: Indian Antiquities: or, dissertations, relative to the ancient geographical divisions, the pure system of primeval theology, the grand code of civil laws, the original form of government, and the various and profound literature, of Hindostan. Compared throughout, with the religion, laws, government, and literature, of Persia, Egypt, and Greece. The whole intended as introductory to the history of Hindostan, upon a comprehensive scale. (By Maurice, Thomas). (London : Printed for the author, and sold by W. Richardson, under the Royal-Exchange, M.DCC.XCIV - M.DCCC. [1794-1800]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2439249~S1
